title: Senior Project Leader, Government Office for Science

content.text: Do you like to think about the future and how we might prepare for it? Do you want a role that allows you to analyse big, systemic issues that will impact the UK? We are looking for a highly motivated individual to deliver Foresight Projects, which identify key challenges and opportunities for government, aiming to inform better policy that is resilient in the long-term.

This role is one of three G7 posts in the division, leading a small team (2 HEOs and 1 intern) to support development of a pipeline of projects and oversee delivery of (usually) one substantial project at a time. This may be combined with flexible work to support the wider horizon-scanning function, and limited dissemination and advice work to cement the impact of projects recently delivered. It is intended that the role holder will initially lead a new project on the Future of Global Supply Chains for DBT and other departments.
For more information, including the full job description and how to apply, please see Civil Service Jobs webpage here.
Apply before 11:55 pm on Monday 29th January 2024
